title: pixel 1 , two month old - the mic, speaker and the earphones jack stop working 5 min after boot
content:
The mic, speaker and earphone jack stop working, reset solve the problem for 5 min and then again the problem return. I try to reset the phone to factory default and don't install any app. I also try to update to android Q (Beta), nothing work.  

I can't use the warranty because I bought it from another country. 

Many thanks,

Ziv.
